entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023
